_metadata.description: Translation Registry: Cross-Lingual Sign Language Mapping (ASL → Concept → BSL)
_metadata.purpose: Single source of truth mapping concepts to ASL/BSL signatures and their embeddings
_metadata.architecture: Concept-based with embedding vectors for cosine similarity matching
_metadata.notes: Format: Concept ID → Multiple ASL instances + Single BSL target + Embedding vectors

CONCEPT_GREETING.notes: ASL one-handed (right) with facial expression, matches BSL greeting

CONCEPT_LOC_QUESTION.notes: Question marker + location inquiry, bilateral hands + raised eyebrows

_transformation_matrix.description: Linear Transformation Matrix mapping ASL semantic space → BSL semantic space
_transformation_matrix.purpose: Enable one-shot learning: new ASL sign → Transform to BSL concept space
_transformation_matrix.method: Procrustes alignment via SVD on concept anchor vectors
_transformation_matrix.requires: All 4 concepts must have both ASL and BSL embeddings computed first
